00023 /* DS structures */
00024 /*************
00025  *
00026  * Name:    dsipcshell
00027  *
00028  * Purpose: DS IPC shell structure
00029  *
00030  * Members: dsipcshellnamep  - Pointer to DS shell name
00031  *          client           - client of the DS shell
00032  *          dsipccbfcnp      - Callback function of the DS user.
00033  *          dssinitcbfp      - function to call once the DS shell has
00034  *                             been created
00035  *
00036  * Note:    The client member provides a higher resolution then the DS shell name.
00037  *          This allows one service to use multiple clients as in the case of QMI.
00038  *
00039  **************/
00040 struct dsipcshell
00041 {
00042     swi_uint8 *dsipcshellnamep;
00043     enum qmisupportedclients client;
00044     void    *dsipccbfcnp;
00045     void    (*dssinitcbfp)(swi_bool);
00046 };
